data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: Shiv Aum Steels Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018 for the Quarter ended 31st December, 2025

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Shiv Aum Steels Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Shiv Aum Steels Limited has informed the Exchange about General Updates about approval received for Migration of Equity Shares of Shiv Aum Steels Limited from NSE Emerge Platform to the Main Board of NSE.
